reviews.text: We booked well in advance and were glad we did - the hotel was full when we arrived. A good choice, especially in comparison to the Marine Motel.
reviews.title: Good value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in a one room cabin - basic room with a bed, sink, fridge, microwave, table, two chairs, AC, and shower (no tub). The cabins are pretty small but more than adequate. We're both birdwatchers so the location was excellent - close walks nearby to desert habitat plus several feeders on the property.
reviews.title: Basic but clean and comfortable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: While the room was clean the walls could have used a good dusting (especially higher up). The duvet was clean but definitely well used and torn in several places on the underside. Given the price ($56) it was OK.
reviews.title: Cute cabin - good price

likes.liked: — Cabin was cozy and clean. Price was good.
likes.disliked: — Wish there was more hot water (there is enough for about one long shower or two shorter ones)

reviews.text: The cabins at La Siesta are rather basic, but are clean and comfortable and a nice change from typical sterile hotel rooms. Cabins have a microwave and fridge so we were able to make our own meals, and a little table to eat at. Everything was cleaned daily. A/C and TV were fully functional - we didn't need the heater, even in March. We didn't try the pool, but it seemed popular. I would recommend La Siesta for trips to Organ Pipe or Cabeza Prieta.
reviews.title: It was strictly OK...nothing more.

likes.liked: — The air conditioning lulled me to sleep.
likes.disliked: — The absolute lack of warmth by the staff.

reviews.title: Decent place for the price
reviews.text: This is a well priced, clean and comfortable motel on the north end of Ajo. We stayed here on our way into Mexico and on our way back out. The cabins are cute - especially for only $50/night. It was freezing when we were there but they have space heaters in the room that work surprisingly well.
Just stayed at the La Siesta ,as part of a trip to Organ Pipe NM.Didn't expect much because of the remoteness and general lack of facilities ,but was pleasantly surprised.
reviews.title: A nice surprise
Decent place for a reasonable price
reviews.text: The room was very large w/ a queen and a double.Separate toilet ,shower and sink w/ counter ,so each could be used independently.All very clean.Also had a table w/ 2 chairs ,fridge and microwave.
